'''Broken Isle''' is a limited time subarea located in the west part of [[Golden Apple Archipelago]].

==Lore==
The main island cluster has five peaks with varying water levels connected to a group of rocks. When high tide presses the rocks down, the island cluster rings with a melody. This melody was used as a high tide alarm by the people who used to live on the archipelago.
